aboutUs.description: We are a boutique real estate consultancy operating in both Turkey and Russia. We treat every client with personalized attention, have deep knowledge of local markets, and support you at every stage of your international property journey. Our goal is to understand your unique needs and match you with the most suitable property. We organize property viewings, assist in negotiations, and guide you through the legal procedures. Open communication and trust are the foundation of our work. We do everything possible to ensure your buying experience is smooth and stress-free.

servicesList.1: Our company is based in Moscow and operates in compliance with Russian legal regulations.
servicesList.2: Our team includes native speakers of Russian, Turkish, and English, ensuring clear and professional communication.
servicesList.3: We offer prime property opportunities across Turkey, especially in Istanbul, Antalya, and Alanya, including apartments, villas, and commercial units.
servicesList.4: With our lawyers registered with the Istanbul Bar, we provide full legal assistance for all purchase, sale, and rental transactions.
servicesList.5: We present land and plot investment opportunities across various regions in Turkey.
servicesList.6: We provide comprehensive consultancy on obtaining Turkish citizenship or residence permit through property purchase.
servicesList.7: For those who already own property in Turkey, we ensure fast and effective sales or rentals through our local partners, targeting the right price in the right timeframe.

supportList.1: Land registry and tax support: We assist with title deeds, foreign currency conversion (DAB), tax filing, and SPK-approved property valuation.
supportList.2: Translation and official guidance: Notary, banking, tax office, migration authority — with professional interpreters by your side.
supportList.3: Rental income models: Short-term rentals, Airbnb management, guaranteed rental options, and site coordination services.
supportList.4: Off-plan property purchases: Support with reputable developers, construction progress tracking, contract checks, and legal risk assessment.
supportList.5: VIP services for premium clients: Private portfolio access, customized viewing trips, accommodation arrangements, full confidentiality.
supportList.6: Fast response from our website: Inquiries through karayaka.ru are responded to within 24 hours.
supportList.7: Post-sale assistance: Utility connections, residence permit applications, moving coordination — we guide you beyond the purchase.

aboutUs.closingNote: With Karayaka, you're not just buying property — you're building a secure and confident new life.

answers.location: We are based in Turkey and operate in both Turkey and Russia, offering our services to clients interested in properties in these regions.
answers.period: The home buying process typically takes 1-2 months from offer to closing. However, this timeline can vary depending on various factors such as property type, location, and legal requirements. We'll guide you through each step and keep you informed of the progress.
answers.tour: Yes, we offer virtual tours for all our properties! Using high-quality video calls, we can show you around any property you're interested in, allowing you to see every detail and ask questions in real-time. This service is particularly valuable for our international clients.
answers.contact: You can reach us through multiple channels: phone, email, or the contact form on our website. We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours. For urgent matters, we recommend calling us directly.
answers.area: In Turkey, we primarily focus on coastal regions and major cities. In Russia, we concentrate on Moscow and its surrounding areas. We carefully select properties in neighborhoods that offer good value and quality of life for our clients.
answers.personnel: Yes, we have extensive knowledge of our operating areas. We regularly visit and research different neighborhoods to stay updated on market conditions, amenities, and community features. This allows us to provide accurate and helpful advice to our clients.
